clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Between Simvastatin and SHR3824
clinical_study.official_title: Drug Interaction Study of Henagliflozin and Simvastatin in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: the purpose of thr study is to investigate the potential interation between multiple oral doses of SHR3824 and single oral dose of Simvastatin in healthy adult volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: The maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of SHR3824
primary_outcome.time_frame: At protocol-specified times up to Day 7 and Day 8
primary_outcome.description: Cmax (a measure of the body's exposure to SHR3824) will be compared before and after coadministration with Simvastatin .

primary_outcome.measure: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of SHR3824
primary_outcome.time_frame: At protocol-specified times up to Day 7 and Day 8
primary_outcome.description: AUC(a measure of the body's exposure to SHR3824) will be compared before and after coadministration with Simvastatin .

primary_outcome.measure: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of Simvastatin and simavastatin acid .
primary_outcome.time_frame: At protocol-specified times up to Day 1 and Day 8
primary_outcome.description: AUC(a measure of the body's exposure to simvastatin and simavastatin acid) will be compared before and after coadministration with SHR3824 .

primary_outcome.measure: The maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of simvastatin and simavastatin acid.
primary_outcome.time_frame: At protocol-specified times up to Day 1 and Day 8
primary_outcome.description: Cmax (a measure of the body's exposure to simvastatin and simavastatin acid) will be compared before and after coadministration with Simvastatin .

primary_outcome.measure: The number of volunteers with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability.

arm_group.description: two 20mg tablets of simvastatin once daily on Day 1 followed by one 10mg tablet of SHR3824 once daily on Day 4,5,6,7,followed by two 20mg tablets of simvastatin and one 10mg tablet of SHR3824 on Day 8.

intervention.description: two 20mg tablets of simvastatin once daily on Day 1 followed by one 10mg tablet of SHR3824 once daily on Day 4,5,6,7,followed by two 20mg tablets of simvastatin and one 10mg tablet of SHR3824 on Day 8.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male volunteers with a body mass index (BMI, a measure of a person's weight in relation to height) between 19 and 26 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of hypoglycemia
- History of urinary tract infections,or genital infections
- History of current clinically significant medical illness as determined by the Investigator
- Known allergy to SHR3824 or Simvastatin or any of the excipients of the formulation of SHR3824 or Simvastatin
